name: com.nextgensoftware.oasis.web4
description: Unity SDK for the OASIS Web4 API - Connect your Unity games to the decentralized OASIS ecosystem with support for 80+ blockchains and storage providers.

samples.description: Example scenes showing avatar login, registration, and profile management
Working with Holons, Zomes, and OASIS data objects
Integrating the OASIS karma system into your game
